website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use Moroccan oil formula that has earned satisfied repeat customers, but also some users who aren't fans of the scent.
pros: Combines Moroccan argan oil with silk protein for a smooth consistency that creates shine and controls frizz
Bottle has a convenient dispensing nozzle
cons: Mixed opinions on the fragrance – some found it pleasant while others comment it's too strong and "perfumey

customer_reviews.title: great light weight oil and smell lovely
customer_reviews.text: best oil hair in the market, i discovered this oil from my friend in NYC 2 summers ago and fall in love especially in the summer when you have curls it's perfect. The oil is not heavy at all light weight you can't even tell if you spray oil on your hair except for the smell. The smell is to die for, people will want to stay next to you to smell your hair this is how good it is, and it's not a strong smell either i'm sensitive to smell due to my sinus and allergy this one is perfect. This is my to go oil spray..
customer_reviews.author: Mitchie

customer_reviews.title: Great oil!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil so much. My hair has become very dry and brittle with winter and my curls desperately needed something. This oil works great! Not too heavy but definitely hydrates well. Smells fantastic and is easy to disperse through hair evenly. I also love that I can add this in shower to my other products (shampoo, conditioner or bodywash) for an extra moisture boost. Love it! Just wish I could buy it in a bigger bottle because I use it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Makes my ends frizz free. I have very coarse hair and it works better on ends than on top. This product smells wonderful and gives my hair a nice shine.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Maul

customer_reviews.title: great on legs!
customer_reviews.text: Great oil, I use it on my arms and legs after showering and it has kept them hydrated, the air is very dry here in the winter and this is a great product. it absorbs quickly and doesn't leave an oily film like baby oil. It doesn't have a strong scent that I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Definitey does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: bought this because my hair is extremely damaged from bleaching and dying it so I needed some form of help for it. I used this with my conditioner and my hair feels so much more hydrated, without feeling weighed down. I am surprised at how much softer my hair is.It even added shine to my hair. Only giving 4 stars because a lof it leaked out during shipping, but i still do have most of the bottle left regardless. My daughter has curly hair and I used it on her as a leave in conditioner and her curls looked so defined and bouncy. I love how this really does work without making hair feel heavy and greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus420

customer_reviews.title: Good value, too much residue.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a little oil to keep my hair healthy between washes but honestly this leaves my hair TOO oily; even with one spray. Other oils I've used don't seem to be as intense. 3 starts because the price, size, and scent are all on point.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Em

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Hair Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, absolutely perfect to my needs! Even though I use Conditioner, my hair is so fine and tangy that I used to get so frustrated...now that I use this product, my hair feels and smells amazing! This is the perfect everyday product that does wonders to my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Yes. And more yes! This stuff kills frizz and helps keep your hair shiny and smooth. I have curly hair and I use this constantly. And it smells amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Gal

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how well this would work. Last night was the first time I used it. I can honestly say I woke up this morning with no frizz,and it stayed that way all day in very humid weather. First I put a pea size of keratherapy in my hair. I let it dry a bit. Then add the keratin oil. I don't spray it in my hair, but in the palms of my hands, then run it through my hair. It's soft and pretty. Smells really good.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Regrows hair?
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product. I’ve been fighting premature balding and heard about using argan oil to strengthen hair and possibly revitalizing hair follicles. All I can say is it is working. My hair is growing back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not right for me, maybe for others?
customer_reviews.text: The seller was great, the product smelled great too (kinda reminded me of elder lady perfume). Only 3 stars just because of my personal experience with the product. It's a lot of keratin so if your hair is sensitive to keratin I wouldn't reccomend this product, can leave your hair feeling dry and brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Good but it is scented
customer_reviews.text: It works really well but be sure you’re able to wash again soon if you have done hair as the roots do get a bit oily. The smell is fine but odorless would be better. Ythe time one uses scented shampoo and conditioner, there is no need to add more to the mix.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Does not make your hair greasy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of different hair oils, but this is the real deal. It works amazingly on fine hair that otherwise gets easily greasy or weighed down. As long as you put it in when your hair is wet and stay away from roots, there is absolutely no greasiness and your hair turns out insanely soft and shiny once it dries!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Oil leaked inside shipping box
customer_reviews.text: The product leaked all inside the box.. any oily product should be placed inside of a zip bag and individual bubble wrapped to prevent this... i lost a nice amount of the oil that could have been used.. the box it came inside in was very oily...
customer_reviews.author: Mzberry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I used all mine up and just love how soft my hair feels after i apply it. I apply it when my hair is damp so when it dries its soft. The smell is sweet too would def get it again
customer_reviews.author: Iris Ahn

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine curly hair and live by the ocean
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine curly hair and live by the ocean. I spend a lot of time diving and in the sun, and my hair gets severely dried out and damaged. The keratin oil has done wonders for me. I spray a little into my hair in the morning and then anytime I've been in the water and it helps a lot with the dryness and makes my curls pretty again instead of frizzy and it doesn't weigh my hair down at all or make it oily either. I definitely recommend this! I also LOVE the shampoo and conditioner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry K

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: I have fine medium length hair and was looking for something to add shine. I've used other OGX products in the past, and was disappointed by this. My hair is dryer and not shiny, not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: the whole box was greasy and when I opened it everything in the box was ruined and the hair junk bottle was completely empty 😢 Wasted me a lot of money
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars, I would. When I received this product, the whole box was greasy and when I opened it everything in the box was ruined and the hair junk bottle was completely empty 😢 Wasted me a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: We keep buying it
customer_reviews.text: We all use it on our hair. The hair feels soft and looks great when it's on it. On a few occasions, when we feel our skin is dry, it has been used in our body. It's great. It feels great and it smells good. We keep buying it. We get a bottle every few months
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff but over-priced.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. A great detangler and adds a bit of shine to hair. You can also use it on your body. But, it is over-priced. I payed more than $30 for one bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The smell is also incredible and for an oil product it's super light.
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that has made its way into my regular regimen. I use a ton of other products but I do adore this one and believe it's made a difference in my hair. I use after every shower when my hair is still wet and I let it air dry overnight. The smell is also incredible and for an oil product it's super light.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Soft hair
customer_reviews.text: I used this in addition to my hair straightner so the ends wouldnt be fried. I love the softness it made my hair feel.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Lester

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has a terrible smell to it. I’ve learned that anything that contains “fragrance” or “perfume” in the ingredients isn’t really good for you. Companies don’t have to disclose what is in this and it’s often used to cover chemical smells. Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry, damaged and frizzy hair. It's frizzy even when it's wet right out of the shower. I already use Argan oil on my ends before and after styling but this spray has made a huge difference. It helps tame fly away strands and makes my hair really shiny without being oily. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Hella expensive but so yummy
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my body only and I always feel so soft and get complimented on how I smell, but $32 is outrageous. I’m assuming it’s because it’s an out of country product for me, so I’ll pay it, but honestly OGX needs to get this on my local shelves. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cate B

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray for my naturally wavy hair. My hair is thick, tangled, and pretty dry. I use it when my hair is damp and also when its dry. It doesnt cause my hair to look too oily. Just naturally shiny/ healthy and keeps it from getting tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: A little too greasy
customer_reviews.text: I use this product just on the ends of my hair when it starts to feel dry. It's too greasy to use everyday and makes my curls lifeless when I do use it. Overall, it's a good moisturizer every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime D

customer_reviews.title: It feels good! and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure yet! I'm not sure about going out in the HOT SUN over 100 degree, with this oil on my hair? It feels good! and looks good? I just don't know if I'm burning my hair more? I will have to get back on this one? It's a good product, I'm just in extreme weather! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: TESS

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. Did what it was supposed to but wasn’t my fav oil product.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey123

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use correctly because spray bottle does not work.
customer_reviews.author: E. Synco

customer_reviews.title: I'm VERY Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This gives my hair a certain look that no other product has managed to do. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Valentin Yslas

customer_reviews.title: Really love this oil!
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with growing my hair longer and couldn’t find anything till now. I have been using it and sell results in one week.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken spray and leaking
customer_reviews.text: The spray itself wasn't working. It wouldn't spray anything when I press it and it just leaks in my palms. I try to just pour it on my palm but it's not really doing anything nice except make my hand greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Yushieru

customer_reviews.title: Good for frizzy hairs.
customer_reviews.text: It is good for frizzy hair. I spray it on damp hair. It works wonder. The best part is that it is a spray bottle which lets even coating on hairs.

customer_reviews.title: Soft hair
customer_reviews.text: This has made my hair so soft!!! Best product for curls. Not oily or greasy. Smells good.

customer_reviews.title: I used this as the directions say & it hydrated ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this as the directions say & it hydrated my hair/ skin. It doesnt make your hair/ skin feel greasy! You can also use this as a leave in .

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC!!
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs nicely. Does not leave you greasy. Use it every day for about 2 years now. Turned my sister onto it too.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Makes hair nice and smooth. Don't apply much or it will csue your hair to be greasy, and I do mean greasy. Just 2 maybe 3 sprays on long thick hair.

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair very tangled and hard to brush with ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair very tangled and hard to brush with VERY minimal amounts. Ended up giving it away because i refused to use it. Made my hair mat up and knot every single time i used it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Will leave you with the softest hair!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent! If you have frizzy hair or naturally curly hair: spray on damp, towel-dried hair.

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Smells like pineapples. I have no idea if my hair is healing but it smells and feels great.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste money.
customer_reviews.text: This product is just like water. There's no difference on my hair. Besides, it is too hard to spray.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my hair
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my hair, but the spray does not work! I have to pour it in my hand to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cornell

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to try a product that might help with ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a product that might help with my grand daughter's naturally curly hair and this one really worked! It helps calm the wild curls and smooth the ends. I am thrilled to find something that works this well. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Leave hair feeling soft
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my hair feeling soft and not greasy. I would definitely recomend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for shine
customer_reviews.text: I use this to smooth out and shine up my dry hair, I only use a little because too much can leave your hair looking a little oily. Works well on small fly-aways
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE Product for Human and Barbie Hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Product is AMAZING!!! Makes my hair shine and so manageable!! ...I found out today this product works on Barbie Hair!!! My daughter has Barbie Dolls that have long thick hair that was becoming very painful to brush and looked horrible so just thought I would give it a try and the difference was UNBELIEVABLE!! The hair feels like human hair now and is Absolutely Beautiful!!! My daughter can now style the hair like hers, she LOVES it!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Estep

customer_reviews.title: I love the Keratin Spray!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Keratin oil! But you can never find it in the stores...

customer_reviews.title: Like the smell
customer_reviews.text: Like the smell. Seems to make my hair frizzier. Doesn't seem to protect much. Definitley don't see the hype. Wouldn't buy again.. For curly hair

customer_reviews.title: Carry this item again
customer_reviews.text: This is the best oil for my hair and I'm disappointed that they're no longer selling it

customer_reviews.title: Its okk!!
customer_reviews.text: It smelled strange but other than that it was fine.

customer_reviews.text: awesome shower oil, i put it on my legs after i shave, rub it in good and rinse off. Legs stay soft!

customer_reviews.text: This is a great hair product with NO oily residue

customer_reviews.title: This product is good, however, the smell is too strong, a little bit "soapy".
customer_reviews.text: This product is good, however, the smell is too strong, a little bit "soapy".

customer_reviews.title: softest, silky hair ever
customer_reviews.text: very nice. arrived in Alaska in great shape. thank you!

customer_reviews.title: I use this everytime I wash my hair, it ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this everytime I wash my hair, it keeps my hair shiny, soft and manageable! I put it on when my hair is wet and I comb through.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: I have actually found this product to be fantastic on my aging hands
customer_reviews.text: I have actually found this product to be fantastic on my aging hands, elbows, and knees. It has cured the dryness better than traditional heavy lotions.. and has a pleasant, light fragrance. And sometimes I use it on my hair. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My hair grows rapidly with this stuff. Perfect for anyone looking to keep their hair happy and healthy! I think my hair grew 1-inch within a month of spraying this stuff lightly along my roots a couple times a week!
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Used this once, but it made a difference in my wash day routine. The smell is great too.
customer_reviews.text: Used this once, but it made a difference in my wash day routine. The smell is great too. Just be careful of spillage.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use before blow drying or ironing
customer_reviews.text: Definitely weightless on hair! Great for everyday use before blow drying or ironing. Not to be used for hydrating purposes but more of an everyday light sheen and extra boost for heat protection. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Light fragrance that smells great. Made my skin feel silky smooth
customer_reviews.text: Light fragrance that smells great. Made my skin feel silky smooth, but did no hydrating or moisturizing. The silky smooth feel left within a few minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Works on fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for baby fine hair.Doesn't weght it down.Very nice smell

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and leaves your hair soft
customer_reviews.text: Has a lovely scent! I am pleased with the output of this product. It leaves my hair soft and shiny. I have thick, curly hair that I blow dry and it's very dry/damaged during the winter months. This product leaves it feeling so soft, and smells wonderful.

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: This product smells amazing but it actually left my hair super dry after using it for about a week.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Makes my hair silky smooth, no frizz and great shine!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: I put it on every time I wash my hair and have seen a difference. Smells good

customer_reviews.text: Makes my very thick, curly and frizzy hair soft and very manageable. Rarely have to use my hot iron. Excellent product and good price.

customer_reviews.text: Usually Argan oil makes my hair oily, the combination of oils makes my hair smooth, soft & manageable. I have hair breakage, within 2 days my hair isn't breaking! Smells very good!

customer_reviews.title: Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Not greasy at all! I didn’t believe any other reviews, but it is so true! It’s a fantastic product!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I have natural curly hair that I color so it can get pretty dry. I add this to my conditioner and my hair feels like silk.

customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff! My hair has grown a little coarse as I've gotten older and this does give my long, frequently hot-ironed hair more softness, and a hint of sheen. Although it probably is possible to get carried away and put on too much, it's a very light formula, so not excessively greasy at all. I spray it onto my hands and gently apply that way so I can feel the coverage, putting a fair amount on the ends.

product_meta.title: OGX Hydrate & Repair + Argan Oil of Morocco Miracle In-Shower Oil, 4 Ounce
product_meta.description: Flavor:Miracle In-Shower OilA unique, multiple use in-shower oil that can used for damaged prevention, moisture multiplier, conditioner boost, skin moisturizer, and split ends mender.
feature_bullets: MORROCAN HAIR SECRET: Repair dry, damaged, brittle tresses with this extra powerful blend infused with argan oil of Morocco. Intensely hydrate, while this blend infused with silk proteins lock in moisture to give hair the look & feel of silky perfection.

SOFT, SEDUCTIVE, SILKY: This rich blend infused with argan oil of Morocco + silk proteins help repair even the most severely dry, damaged strands, drenching them w/ hydration & helping to strengthen your strands. Discover the Morrocan magic of argan oil

BEAUTY PURE AND SIMPLE: OGX hair care products are inspired by nature. We don’t try to make hair look “perfect” because we’d rather make hair look fuller, smoother, straighter, curlier, or bouncier & smell irresistible while we’re at it.

ROCK WHAT YOU'VE GOT: OGX hair care products are designed to bring out the best in your hair, no matter what type or texture. Whether you need quenching moisture for curly hair, protection for colored hair, blowout cream, or matte pomade--we've got you.

THE OGX DIFFERENCE:Try OGX if you've used products by Pureology, Head & Shoulders, Kerastase, Paul Mitchell, Batiste, Biolage, Pantene, Redken, Oribe, Loreal, Herbal Essences, TreSemme, Matrix, Bumble & Bumble, Biolage, Bed Head, Deva Curl, Living Proof
